Title: Chapter 54
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Melissa James Gibson, Beau Willimon (created for television by), Tian Jun Gu (staff writer)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Paul Sparks
Plot: Frank and his team work to leverage support in key states by any means necessary. Claire learns some upsetting news about one of Frank's friends.
